description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.99 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #ff0000, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
